room_types.name: Deluxe Suite
room_types.description: Spacious suite with ocean view, king bed, balcony, and Jacuzzi.

room_types.name: Standard Room
room_types.description: Comfortable room with queen bed and city view.

room_types.name: Family Room
room_types.description: Large room with 2 double beds, ideal for families.

policies.cancellation: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before check-in.
policies.smoking: Smoking is not allowed in rooms.

frequently_asked_questions.Do you have free parking?: Yes, we offer complimentary parking for all guests.
frequently_asked_questions.Is breakfast included?: Breakfast is included with Deluxe and Family Rooms. For Standard Rooms, it's available at an extra charge.
frequently_asked_questions.Do you allow early check-in?: Early check-in is subject to availability and may incur an additional fee.
frequently_asked_questions.Is there a laundry service?: Yes, we offer same-day laundry and dry-cleaning services.
